page.title: 07THE JUBILEE HALL
page.content: The{Jubilee Hall}in Little Shore Lane was completed in 1980 after years of discussion. It is the largest and most used{community hall}in the town. It is hired out for both recreational and social events and is used by a cross-section of the community. For example the elderly go there and many are driven there in the{local minibus to the luncheon club or the{Pop-in {Club. The{local theatre group}also takes advantage of the stage and lighting. {Public meetings}are held there too,and it is also frequently hired out for parties,discos and wedding receptions.
